me.normanmaurer.niosmtp.delivery

  • Classes in me.normanmaurer.niosmtp.delivery used by me.normanmaurer.niosmtp.delivery 
    Class and Description
    Authentication 
    Authentication.AuthMode 
    DeliveryRecipientStatus
    Status for the delivery of an email to a recipient
    DeliveryRecipientStatus.DeliveryStatus 
    SMTPDeliveryAgent
    SMTPDeliveryAgent which use the wrapped SMTPClientTransport to deliver email via SMTP
    SMTPDeliveryAgentConfig
    Configuration which is used to deliver email via SMTP
    SMTPDeliveryAgentConfig.PipeliningMode 
    SMTPDeliveryEnvelope
    A SMTPDeliveryEnvelope is a complete transaction which is used to deliver an email per SMTP.
    SMTPDeliverySessionConstants
    Constants for temporary data which will get stored via the SMTPClientSession.setAttribute(String, Object)() while sending the message.
